title: Localize game interface to Spanish

requirements.text: Translate all user-facing text in the game interface to Spanish, including: game title, button labels ('Start Game', 'Play Again'), score displays, timer label, high score text, game over messages, and any other visible text elements
acceptanceCriteria: All button text appears in Spanish
Score and timer labels are translated
Game over screen messages are in Spanish
High score display text is in Spanish
Ad placeholder labels remain in English as technical indicators
No English text visible to players during gameplay

requirements.text: Update the HTML page title and meta tags to Spanish
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab title displays game name in Spanish
HTML meta description uses Spanish text

constraints: Do not modify backend functionality or data structures
Preserve all existing game mechanics and behavior
Maintain the same visual design and styling
nonGoals: Translating code comments or developer-facing text
Translating the caffeine.ai attribution in footer
Backend error messages or console logs
